verbs.description: [ARG0: supreme court] [V: gives] [ARG1: greenlight] [ARG2: to sports gambling] the u s supreme court has opened the door to sports gambling in new york the four commercial casinos in the state can begin offering sports gambling now that the country top court has struck down a federal law restricting where sports gambling is [C-ARG1: allowed the state law that allowed commercial live - table casinos in new york included a provision authorizing wagering on sporting events if the federal law was found unconstitutional las vegas gambling national basketball association adam silver silver sevens hotel and casino al smith] supreme court
